profile:
Our Clients are #1 priority so we truly believe in high business ethics as far as relations with our clients are concerned. We strongly intend to develop a closer trust based on a long-term business relationship with our clients. Equally important to us is that our quality of products delivered matches the quality of our service. Our furniture is well maintained and spotless. If an item in our collection is damaged, ripped, broken or stained… it does NOT leave our showroom.
When you team up with Stagers Choice, you get more than a catalog of fine furniture, you get a team of professionals willing to go beyond to help you with your project and make your experience with us efficient & profitable.

We have flexible prices & lease terms and delivery all over GTA is available within 24 hours.

profile:
Elite Furniture Rental is the GTA’s premier furniture rental supplier that has been the go-to source for stagers from all over Ontario. Our exquisite collection of high end furniture and luxurious home accessories will fit any style and budget. Whether you have an ongoing staging project or planning one in the future, we are ready to exceed your expectations!

– We have High end designer products
– We work to fit your style and budget
– Service across Ontario

***

Showroom:

With a 40,000 square foot showroom and flexible hours, as well our simple online ordering system you can rest assured that all your staging needs will be taken care of within the shortest turnaround period in the industry. Whether your project is a condominium in downtown Toronto or a cottage in Muskoka, no request is too simple or too complex. We work around your schedule so if the unexpected does happen, we are ready to assist you every day, all day, any day.

– Giant 40,000 sq. ft. showroom
– Fastest service in the industry
– On call 24/7/365 including holidays

***

Staff:

Our expert staff are just a click or phone call away which means we are ready to assist with every aspect of the staging process. We pride ourselves on our industry leading customer service and we back it up with our iron clad guarantee – every call, email, fax, etc. will be answered same business day. We understand that working in a time sensitive industry means that response time is everything, and it is our superior customer service that sets us apart from the competition and makes us the number one choice for stagers from all over Ontario.

– Experienced staff
– On time delivery guarantee
– Loyalty program and discounts

***

Contact us today or stop by and visit us. 

Monday - Friday: 10:00am to 7:00pm Saturday: 10:00am to 4:00pm Sunday: by appointment only
